data.title: American International College
data.meta_description: American International College's interactive campus map features photos and descriptions of academic and administrative buildings, parking lots, dormitory halls, and athletic fields.
data.text:
From the North

Take Interstate 91 (I-91) South

As you approach Springfield, take exit 8 for I-291/US-20 E

Take exit 2A to merge onto Chestnut St

Turn right onto Liberty St

Turn left onto Dwight St

Turn left onto State St

Travel less than 2 miles up State St to 1000 State St.

Turn right on to Concord Terrace and the Admissions parking lot will be on the left.

Follow signs on campus to the Admissions Office

From the South

Take Interstate 91 (I-91) North.

Take exit 6 toward Springfield Center

Merge onto E Columbus Ave

Turn right onto State St

Travel 2 miles up State St to 1000 State St.

The Main campus will be on your right.

Turn right onto Concord Terrace and the Admissions parking lot will be on the left.

Follow signs on campus to the Admissions Office

From the East or West
